author: Colin Dacre
title: Kelowna RCMP Coffee with a Cop returns this week (Kelowna)
description: The Kelowna RCMP is bringing back its Coffee with a Cop outreach program this week. author: The Boston Globe
title: I ordered a large coffee and a condo. I got both.
description: It took me years — and tears — but I bought a below-market home thanks to Boston’s housing programs. You can, too.The post I ordered a large coffee and a condo. I got both. appeared first on Boston.com.

title: Me Oh My Coffee and Pie opens location in Loveland
description: Me Oh My Coffee and Pie in Loveland, 280 E. 29th St., will be open from 7 a.m. to 3 p.m. daily.

title: Businessman arrested in Costa breaks down in tears after crash killed pedestrian
description: A businessman who has been convicted of manslaughter after driving over a pedestrian broke down in tears as he was arrested in a Costa Coffee.

author: Clara Ludmir, Contributor
title: Nespresso Launches Its Pilot Of Home-Compostable Capsules
description: The coffee giant launches a collection of home-compostable capsules in France and Switzerland, as a response to mounting pressure around the wasteful nature of aluminium pods .
